One evening, he decides to win the heart of his beloved, who until now has been cruel and deaf to his fiery declarations, and if necessary, he'll kidnap her. Hidden at the edge of the woods, when Alphonsine goes by, Sosthène rolls through the grass until he lands at the beauty's feet, proclaiming his love in a deranged voice: \"Be mine, or die!\", \"You idiot!\". Blood rushes to Sosthène's head. His breath becomes so ragged that it can be heard a mile away, catching the attention of the famous detective Zigoto who was walking Bouboule, his no less famous police dog.","popularity":3.481,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1912-09-13","title":"Zigoto et la blanchisseuse","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[35,18,10749],"id":858347,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Ticking","overview":"In this psychological thriller, we dive into the mind of a middle-aged man named Norman who suffers from schizophrenia. As the events unfold there is a glimpse of hope underneath his suffering.","popularity":0.813,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"","title":"Ticking","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":859058,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"バス停にて","overview":"Paper animation, directed and animated by Anno while he was at university to show at a college screening.","popularity":3.476,"poster_path":"/eVFpkrg2XXGsDFnnpYoNOd0JFh1.jpg","release_date":"1980-01-01","title":"At the Bus Stop","video":false,"vote_average":2.5,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[35],"id":697805,"original_language":"en","original_title":"These Uncertain Times","overview":"These Uncertain Times is an experimental short film conceived as a way to keep making films during the COVID-19 crisis. The first film maker was given no prompt, no story, no line of dialogue; nothing, and was tasked with filming and cutting the first 60 seconds of a short film. This was then handed off to the next film maker who continued the story with their own 60 seconds and handing it off to the next film maker. Each artist only having 24 hours to complete their section.","popularity":0.511,"poster_path":"/1EW19G2OvwYJqBFJEklDK6VZWH1.jpg","release_date":"2020-04-27","title":"These Uncertain Times","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/3SGR4jVt1pcB9is3kHags8lRhSP.jpg","genre_ids":[16],"id":697877,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"La Belle au Bois d'Or","overview":"","popularity":1.442,"poster_path":"/lOYR5LanB4WFkxYDqQbdUWaRMwK.jpg","release_date":"2001-01-01","title":"Beauty of the Golden Wood","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388821,"original_language":"xx","original_title":"Study No. 5","overview":"An abstract ballet set to \"I've Never Seen a Smile Like Yours\".","popularity":3.347,"poster_path":"/uDMyArBYsqIibhcILdTH5EJcQeC.jpg","release_date":"1930-08-01","title":"Study No. 5","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16,10752,10751],"id":388860,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"あひる陸戰隊","overview":"The conflict between ducklings and frogs escalates into war. With the help of Kikachiro Kawamoto and Noburo Ofuji, this is the first animated short/commercial in stop-motion made for Japanese cinemas!","popularity":5.102,"poster_path":"/gIB8FhSrpEpmNsLgHanTmy07ZvN.jpg","release_date":"1956-07-05","title":"Beer, those were the days","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388866,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"フクチャンの潜水艦","overview":"Fuku-chan was one of the most popular newspaper comic strip boy-characters in Japan at the time. The film portrays a submarine attack on an enemy cargo ship. Though this, too, was to boost patriotism, Japanese children particularly enjoyed the scenes in which the kitchen crew cooked in the submarine kitchen. Released in November of the same year, the food shortage was quite serious in Japan, and the abundant food supply in the submarine kitchen -- vegetables, fruit, fish, rice, and more which were already luxury items in Japan at the time -- was prepared into various dishes along with a merry, rhythmic song.","popularity":2.099,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1944-11-09","title":"Fuku-chan's Submarine","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388867,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"元禄恋模様 三吉とおさよ","overview":"When a samurai witnesses a dancing maiden being kidnapped by ruffians, he rescues the poor damsel and takes her to the spring flower dance.","popularity":2.313,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1934-06-23","title":"Sankichi and Osayo: A Genroku Romance","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388868,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"蟹満寺縁起","overview":"An early silhouette animated film by Hidehiko Okuda, Hakusan Kimura and Tomu Uchida. The original story is a Buddhist tale of a young lady who saved a crab (a spiritual being according to Japanese Buddhist faith) from being eaten, and was later saved from danger by the same crab.","popularity":4.519,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1925-01-02","title":"Crab Temple Omen","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388869,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"魔法のペン","overview":"A western occupation propaganda film in which a boy repairs a western style doll that comes to life and uses a magic pen to rebuild his bleak and war torn world into a happy place resembling western civilization.","popularity":5.065,"poster_path":"/vWYCEKxas7ytmCt5wt8HdD4lA6w.jpg","release_date":"1946-01-01","title":"The Magic Pen","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388870,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"マレー沖海戦","overview":"A war propaganda film by Oofuji Noburou.","popularity":4.196,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1943-01-01","title":"The Battle of the Malay Sea","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388874,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"ムクの木の話","overview":"Short animated film  from 1947","popularity":0.28,"poster_path":"/2Ngxb9OVlDyNAmWLesCXfYkBwzA.jpg","release_date":"1947-09-25","title":"Muku no Ki no Hanashi","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[16],"id":388876,"original_language":"ja","original_title":"お蝶夫人の幻想","overview":"Butterfly, a faithful Japanese wife, waits patiently in Nagasaki for the return of her American husband, Pinkerton. She sees the Stars and Stripes fluttering atop an approaching ship and rightly surmises that Pinkerton is onboard. However, the feckless foreigner is arriving in the company of his \"real\" Caucasian wife, causing the heartbroken Butterfly to commit suicide. This masterpiece of Japanese silhouette animation makes the best of its source material.","popularity":0.547,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1940-05-16","title":"Madame Butterfly's Illusion","video":false,"vote_average":4.0,"vote_count":1}],"total_pages":10197,"total_results":203938}
